sense.def:
To compare things
pomeni stvari oceniti in ugotoviti njihove razlike ali podobnosti.

seg.quote: It's interesting to compare the two prospectuses.
...studies comparing Russian children with those in Britain.
The fee is low, compared with that at many other independent schools.

sense.def:
To compare one person or thing to another
pomeni reči, da sta si dva človeka ali stvari podobna.

seg.quote: As an essayist he is compared frequently to Paine and Hazlitt.
